name: smartcare-flow
description: Problem: Medicines get overstocked in some hospitals and run out in others due to poor forecasting, manual tracking, and slow redistribution, especially during outbreaks and crises. â€‹ Solution: A smart logistics platform that forecasts demand, monitors inventory in real time, and optimizes redistribution routes so the right drugs are at the right place and time.

scripts.build: npm install --prefix Backend && npm install --prefix Frontend && npm run build --prefix Frontend
